module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *12.0.10* Better module signing text *12.0.9* Sub Depends checking *12.0.8* Catch exceptions gracefully *12.0.7* FREEPBX-8213 Stop never ending CLI install loops *12.0.6* Remove the last of the sounds from the sounds folder *12.0.5* FREEPBX-8190 signature fixes, FREEPBX-8102 allow modules to be removed that have missing dependencies *12.0.4* KV Recovery and fixes for installer *12.0.3* Fixes to check online *12.0.2* First Stable Release of 12
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
